comments.name: remarks
comments.value: Runs a set of code on an interval.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Functional code that will run when this interval occurs.

comments.name: param
comments.value: An interval of every N ticks that the callback will be called upon.

comments.name: returns
comments.value: An opaque handle that can be used with the clearRun method to stop the run of this function on an interval.
